text: dva morya ye ne toy zhe; kozhnyy ye svizhyy ta duzhe smachnyy, v toy chas, yak inshyy solonyy ta undrinkable. Z kozhnykh z nykh vy yiste nizhne m'yaso, ta vytyahayete yuvelirni vyroby nosyty. Ta vy bachyte , shcho korabel π plavaye cherez nykh, shukayuchy Yoho umov, shcho vy mozhete buty appreciative
